title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken pieces marinated in spices, served in a creamy tomato sauce.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing with croutons and Parmesan cheese.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

title: Sushi Platter
description: Assortment of fresh sushi rolls including tuna, salmon, and California rolls.

title: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onions, and melted cheese.

title: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a tangy sauce.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet seasoned and grilled to perfection.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with mushrooms, onions, and Parmesan cheese.

title: Tandoori Chicken
description: Spicy marinated chicken cooked in a traditional clay oven, served with naan bread.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh salad made with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and balsamic glaze.

title: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Tender strips of beef stir-fried with mixed vegetables in a savory sauce.
